summary.content: During my module on After Effects, I ended up playing ALOT of Zelda: Wind Waker. Right now, I’m in “Publication and Design”, and I haven’t really had alot of time to play. At this point, I just have to find the rest of the heart pieces, find the TriForce maps so I can find the shards, and then go beat the crap outta Ganon. I beat Final Fantasy Tactics a few weeks ago. I hate Delita. Even though he’s supposed to be your best friend, don’t trust him.

content.html:
During my module on After Effects, I ended up playing ALOT of Zelda: Wind Waker. Right now, I’m in “Publication and Design”, and I haven’t really had alot of time to play. At this point, I just have to find the rest of the heart pieces, find the TriForce maps so I can find the shards, and then go beat the crap outta Ganon.

I beat Final Fantasy Tactics a few weeks ago. I hate Delita. Even though he’s supposed to be your best friend, don’t trust him. In the end, you’ll die and he’ll take over as king of Ivalice, reigning over the land with the peace that you brought. Stupid Jerk!

I’ve taken a break from the GameCube version of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. If I don’t even have the time to beat Wind Waker, I definitely don’t yet have time to finish Zelda: Ocarina of Time.
content.plain:
During my module on After Effects, I ended up playing ALOT of Zelda: Wind Waker. Right now, I’m in “Publication and Design”, and I haven’t really had alot of time to play. At this point, I just have to find the rest of the heart pieces, find the TriForce maps so I can find the shards, and then go beat the crap outta Ganon.
I beat Final Fantasy Tactics a few weeks ago. I hate Delita. Even though he’s supposed to be your best friend, don’t trust him. In the end, you’ll die and he’ll take over as king of Ivalice, reigning over the land with the peace that you brought. Stupid Jerk!
I’ve taken a break from the GameCube version of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. If I don’t even have the time to beat Wind Waker, I definitely don’t yet have time to finish Zelda: Ocarina of Time.
content.source:
During my module on After Effects, I ended up playing ALOT of Zelda: Wind Waker. Right now, I’m in “Publication and Design”, and I haven’t really had alot of time to play. At this point, I just have to find the rest of the heart pieces, find the TriForce maps so I can find the shards, and then go beat the crap outta Ganon.

I beat Final Fantasy Tactics a few weeks ago. I hate Delita. Even though he’s supposed to be your best friend, don’t trust him. In the end, you’ll die and he’ll take over as king of Ivalice, reigning over the land with the peace that you brought. Stupid Jerk!

I’ve taken a break from the GameCube version of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. If I don’t even have the time to beat Wind Waker, I definitely don’t yet have time to finish Zelda: Ocarina of Time.
